metadata.title: CVE-2022-3172 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in kube-apiserver that allows an aggregatedAPI server to redirect client traffic to any URL. This could lead to theclient performing unexpected actions as well as forwarding the client's APIserver credentials to third parties.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
